item.title: Working with Me
item.description: Working With Me NOTE: I may update this in the future. Its not a static document. Inspired by others I have seen over the years, I can’t claim complete originality for this sort of idea. I most definitely appreciate what it attempts to empower for anyone that is trying to work with the author of such a document. Anyway, the following is intended to be a guide for working with me.
